title: Readout of the President's Phone Call with Henry Louis Gates, Jr. | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 24, 2009

 



Readout of the President's Phone Call with Henry Louis Gates, Jr.




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  _________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                         July 24, 2009  Readout of the President’s Phone Call with Henry Louis Gates, Jr.  The President called and connected with Professor Gates at 3:15 this afternoon. They had a positive discussion during which the President told Gates about his call with Sgt. Crowley and statement to the media. The President also invited Gates to join him with Sgt. Crowley at the White House in the near future.
